content.en: Sparse signal recovery: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to improve the recovery of sparse signals in compressed sensing. These algorithms, such as reweighted ℓ1 minimization, nonlinear conjugate gradient method, NESTA algorithm, and mixed ℓ2/ℓq norm minimization, have shown promising results in accurately recovering signals from undersampled data. Additionally, researchers have explored the use of nonconvex shrinkage penalties, joint regularization, negentropy-based sparsity-promoting reconstruction, and other techniques to further enhance the performance of compressed sensing algorithms.
content.da: Sparse signal recovery: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre genvindingen af sparse signaler i komprimeret sensing. Disse algoritmer, såsom vægtet ℓ1-minimering, ikke-lineær konjugeret gradientmetode, NESTA-algoritmen og blandet ℓ2/ℓq-normminimering, har vist lovende resultater i nøjagtigt at genvinde signaler fra undersamplede data. Derudover har forskere undersøgt brugen af ikke-konvekse shrinkage-penaltyer, fælles regularisering, negentropi-baseret sparsitet-fremmende rekonstruktion og andre teknikker for yderligere at forbedre ydeevnen af komprimeret sensing algoritmer.
